tool_description: Calculates comprehensive project costs including materials, hardware, finishing supplies, and optional tool purchases or rentals.

lumber_board_feet.description: Total board feet of lumber needed

wood_cost_per_bf.description: Cost per board foot of selected wood species

tools_to_purchase.description: New tools that need to be purchased

usage: Input lumber requirements and wood pricing. Optionally add hardware, finishing supplies, and tool costs. The tool provides detailed cost breakdown.

total_project_cost.description: Complete project cost including all items
